Title: Requires the furnishing of those placed on leave with notice of the charges within forty-five days of being placed on leave
Summary: Requires the furnishing of those placed on leave with notice of the charges within forty-five days of being placed on leave and creates the presumption of invalidity for the charges against the employee in the event the forty-five days passes without furnishing the notice and charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง75, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the furnishing of those placed on leave with notice of the charges within forty-five days of being placed on leave
